abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performance by early-music master Jordi Savall with son Ferran Savall at Morgan Library & Museum.
snippet: The early-music master Jordi Savall was joined by his son, Ferran, for a performance the blended a range of music from the New World and Old at the Morgan Library & Museum.
lead_paragraph: The early-music master Jordi Savall was joined by his son, Ferran, for a performance the blended a range of music from the New World and Old at the Morgan Library & Museum.

headline.main: Generational Exchange: Father and Son, Side by Side
headline.print_headline: Generational Exchange: Father and Son, Side by Side
headline.seo: Jordi and Ferran Savall at Morgan Library & Museum - Review
